name: BostonLocalNews(unofficial)
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: boston local news
des:
When launching the skill, titles of the latest top 5 news in Boston are returned.
You can hear the news again, by saying “once more”, "reset" or "restart".

https://www.wcvb.com/local-news
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
